title: US-Film-Industry
description: This repository contains data related to the US film industry, including box office grosses, movie ratings, and director information.

data.name: box_office.csv
data.description: Box office grosses for US movies from 2000-2020

variables.name: gross_domestic
variables.description: Domestic gross box office revenue in US dollars

variables.name: gross_foreign
variables.description: Foreign gross box office revenue in US dollars

data.name: movie_ratings.csv
data.description: Ratings data for US movies from 2000-2020

variables.name: rating
variables.description: Movie rating on a scale of 1 to 10
